39 #include <stdbool.h>
40 #include <stdint.h>
41 #include "nrf_delay.h"
42 #include "nrf_gpio.h"
43 #include "boards.h"
44 
48 int main(void){
49  /* Configure the LED 1 as output. */
50  nrf_gpio_cfg_output(LED_1);
51 
52  /* Toggle LED 1 after every 500 ms */
53  while (true){
54  nrf_gpio_pin_toggle(LED_1);
55  nrf_delay_ms(500);
56  }
57 }
